short_summary: Yorkton, SK - abatement of lead dust impacts and removal of asbestos containing materials at RCMP F Division Yorkton, Saskatchewan District Office
description: The work is to be completed at the Royal Canadian Mounted Police F Division Yorkton, Saskatchewan District Office to abate lead dust impacts associated with the firing range and remove all asbestos containing materials (ACMs) within the lead dust abatement work area.
full_summary:
# ET022-230585 Asbestos and Lead Abatement Yorkton, Saskatchewan

### Notice URL
* [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14963413?extsite=MTQ5NjM0MTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14963413?extsite=MTQ5NjM0MTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** WS3792088791-Doc3792106234
* **Amendment Number:** 5
* **SolicitationNumber:** WS3792088791
* **Publication Date:** December 22, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 17, 2023 at 14:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** February 3, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2023
* **Procurement Category:** Communications
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None
* **Regions of Delivery:** Saskatoon

### Description

Request for Proposal (RFP) request for the abatement of lead dust impacts associated with the firing range and removal of all asbestos-containing materials (ACMs) at the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) F Division Yorkton, Saskatchewan District Office.

**Key Details:**

* MANDATORY SITE VISIT: There will be a site visit on January 17, 2023 at 10:00am. Interested bidders must communicate with the Contracting Authority by January 13, 2023 to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend.
* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by February 17, 2023 at 14:00 EST. Bids submitted after this time will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

**Contact Information:**

* **Name:** Matthew Keenan (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** matthew.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone:** None
* **Address:** None
* **Fax:** None

### Attachment

None
